channel.title: Could Someone Help me With this?
channel.description:
Hey, My Server has farming, but must of the players don't know how to do it. So They don't use it. It's very simple they just need a menu to guide them.
So I Just wanted to open a menu every time they click on an NPC, Like This:
[IMG]http://i2.tinypic.com/7yn633o.jpg[/img]
And Then a Menu pops up with instructions...
So I know How to make a Menu, I just don't know How to make it Like when they click on the NPC it pops up.
So Please could you Help me with this?
Thanks ;)

item.title: Could Someone Help me With this?
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Yes i just found it
Add this under your case 155

				} else if (NPCID == PUTHERETHENPCID) { // Farming girl
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				farminmenu();

thanks vorarg

Read full topic
item.source: Could Someone Help me With this?

item.title: Could Someone Help me With this?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Case 155 is first click NPC
Case 17 is second click NPC
Case 21 is third click NPC

So like:

} else if (NPCID == ####) { loadMenu(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Could Someone Help me With this?

item.title: Could Someone Help me With this?
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

I think its like this but im not home so i cant test for errors soz if im wrong
maybe you need to edit the case

case 40: sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), NPC ID); sendFrame126("Do you want to see the farming menu?"); farminmenu(); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 04:53:35 AM[/size][hr][quote=“eczema3, post:4, topic:172999”][quote author=leetzone link=topic=233220.msg1994131#msg1994131 date=1200239096]
Now you just need to add it so the npc shows it
[/quote]

would you do that with the same sort of method as the wanneshop?[/quote]

I think that can but i cant find the 1 click npc

item.title: Could Someone Help me With this?
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

public void farminmenu()
	{
		sendQuest("@red@Farming menu", 8144);  //Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("", 8145);
		sendQuest("", 8147);
		sendQuest("", 8148);
		sendQuest("", 8149);
		sendQuest("", 8150);
		sendQuest("", 8152);
		sendQuest("", 8153);
		sendQuest("", 8154);
		sendQuest("", 8155);
		sendQuest("", 8156);
		sendQuest("", 8157);
		sendQuest("", 8158);
		sendQuest("", 8159);
		sendQuest("", 8160);
		sendQuest("", 8161);
		sendQuest("", 8162);
		sendQuest("", 8163);
		sendQuest("", 8164);
		sendQuest("", 8165);
		sendQuest("", 8166);
		sendQuest("", 8167);
		sendQuest("", 8168);
		sendQuest("", 8169);
		sendQuest("", 8170);
		sendQuest("", 8171);
		sendQuest("", 8172);
		sendQuest("", 8173);
		sendQuest("", 8174);
		sendQuest("", 8175);
		sendQuest("", 8176);
		sendQuest("", 8177);
		sendQuest("", 8178);
		sendQuest("", 8179);
		sendQuest("", 8180);
		sendQuest("", 8181);
		sendQuest("", 8182);
		sendQuest("", 8183);
		sendQuest("", 8184);
		sendQuest("", 8185);
		sendQuest("", 8186);
		sendQuest("", 8188);
		sendQuest("", 8189);
		sendQuest("", 8190);
		sendQuest("", 8191);
		sendQuest("", 8192);
		sendQuest("", 8193);
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	}

Now you just need to add it so the npc shows it
